metadata.description: Ripped from the pages of the monumental Rising Stars, learn the truth behind Laurel Darkhaven's telekinetic secrets in this new limited series! Writer Fiona Avery (Amazing Spider-Man, the award-winning Arana) and artist Brent Anderson craft the tale of young "Special" Laurel Darkhaven, an 18-year-old high-school graduate recruited as a CIA assassin. International intrigue abounds!
metadata.name: Rising Stars: Untouchable
